thread.title: Mr Terence Groves
thread.title_full: Car Mats UK reviewed by Mr Terence Groves

author: Mr Terence Groves
title: Mr Terence Groves
text: I am bowled over by the speed of the delivery the quality of the car mats l was constantly kept up to date with when the mats were going to be delivered. Not only do they fit perfectly but they make my car look even better. When I enquired with the garage where l purchased the car from, they Quote: d me £142 for the mats, l payed just over £33 what a saving. Would recommend car mats uk to anyone
